metadata.title: CVE-2022-41804 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Unauthorized error injection in Intel(R) SGX or Intel(R) TDX for someIntel(R) Xeon(R) Processors may allow a privileged user to potentiallyenable escalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
